info.name: Stream Manager Operator
info.description:
This collection contains tests for stream manager APIs to run as an operator user.

Documentation for stream manager APIs can be found on 172.28.12.54/docs

exec: pm.test("Body IsAdministrator field to show it is logged in", function () {

request.description:
logs in with a valid username
admin - admin / sm1000
operator - operator / sm1000

item.name: Update Stream Metadata - Operator Cannot Update

exec: pm.test("C78231 Verify operator cannot have edited stream", function () {

request.description:
important things to know for the test:

you will need the id (or metadataID) to change the stream. that id is the unique identifier of the stream.

we need a way to mass update metadata for load testing.

item.name: Get Lists
item.description: get lists of different items/information from stream manager.

exec: pm.test("Body IsAdministrator field to show it is logged in", function () {

request.description:
logs in with a valid username
admin - admin / sm1000
operator - operator / sm1000
gets a list of all contacts associated with the stream manager.
gets a list of all appliances
gets a list of all issue streams from stream manager.
gets a list of all locations associated with a stream manager
gets a list of all offlined sfs streams from stream manager.

item.name: Get all offlined streams no media flag

request.description: This technically has its own TID. Im not really sure how much it differs from Get all offline sfs streams. The only difference is that there is no type: media property in this one.
Returns a list of connected appliances and their current connections and streamcount.

item.name: Get all offline streams SSL VPN

request.description: offline appliace = SSL VPN
gets a list of all streams (grid)
Retrieves a list of users. if you are an admin, you should see all the users. if you are an operator, you should only see yourself.
Gets a list of all zones in stream manager

exec: //this API gets information for stream test_stream_alpha, which has a metadata_id of 1

request.description: gets a stream map of a test stream based on its metadata_id
